capabilities.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<DeviceCap version="2.0" xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema">
<isSupportReboot>true</isSupportReboot>
<isSupportDeviceInfo>true</isSupportDeviceInfo>
<isSupportTimeCap>true</isSupportTimeCap>
<isSupportUpdatefirmware>true</isSupportUpdatefirmware>
<isSupportPostUpdateFirmware>true</isSupportPostUpdateFirmware>
<isSupportFactoryReset>true</isSupportFactoryReset>
<SysCap>
<isSupportDst>true</isSupportDst>
<NetworkCap version="2.0" xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema">
<isSupportWireless>true</isSupportWireless>
<isSupportPPPoE>false</isSupportPPPoE>
<isSupportBond>false</isSupportBond>
<isSupport802_1x>false</isSupport802_1x>
<isSupportNtp>true</isSupportNtp>
<isSupportFtp>false</isSupportFtp>
<isSupportUpnp>false</isSupportUpnp>
<isSupportDdns>false</isSupportDdns>
<isSupportHttps>true</isSupportHttps>
<SnmpCap>
<isSupport>false</isSupport>
</SnmpCap>
<isSupportExtNetCfg>false</isSupportExtNetCfg>
<isSupportSSH>true</isSupportSSH>
<isSupportEZVIZ>true</isSupportEZVIZ>
<isSupportEhome>true</isSupportEhome>
<isSupportWirelessDial>false</isSupportWirelessDial>
<isSupportWirelessServer>false</isSupportWirelessServer>
<isSupportEZVIZUnbind>true</isSupportEZVIZUnbind>
<isSupportEZVIZQRcode>true</isSupportEZVIZQRcode>
</NetworkCap>
<SerialCap>
<rs485PortNums>1</rs485PortNums>
</SerialCap>
<VideoCap  version="2.0" xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema">
<videoInputPortNums>1</videoInputPortNums>
<videoOutputPortNums>0</videoOutputPortNums>
<isSupportHeatmap>false</isSupportHeatmap>
<isSupportCounting>false</isSupportCounting>
<isSupportPreviewSwitch>false</isSupportPreviewSwitch>
<isSupportRecodStatus>false</isSupportRecodStatus>
<isSupportPrivacyMask>false</isSupportPrivacyMask>
<isSupportBinocularPreviewSwitch>false</isSupportBinocularPreviewSwitch>
<isSupportCalibCheck>false</isSupportCalibCheck>
<isSupportPIP>false</isSupportPIP>
</VideoCap>
<AudioCap version="2.0" xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema">
<audioInputNums>1</audioInputNums>
<audioOutputNums>1</audioOutputNums>
<mixAudioInSet>false</mixAudioInSet>
<mixAudioOutSet>false</mixAudioOutSet>
<isSupportAudioMixing>false</isSupportAudioMixing>
</AudioCap>
<VideoCap  version="2.0" xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema">
<videoInputPortNums>1</videoInputPortNums>
<videoOutputPortNums>0</videoOutputPortNums>
<isSupportHeatmap>false</isSupportHeatmap>
<isSupportCounting>false</isSupportCounting>
<isSupportPreviewSwitch>false</isSupportPreviewSwitch>
<isSupportRecodStatus>false</isSupportRecodStatus>
<isSupportPrivacyMask>false</isSupportPrivacyMask>
<isSupportBinocularPreviewSwitch>false</isSupportBinocularPreviewSwitch>
<isSupportCalibCheck>false</isSupportCalibCheck>
<isSupportPIP>false</isSupportPIP>
</VideoCap>
<AudioCap version="2.0" xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema">
<audioInputNums>1</audioInputNums>
<audioOutputNums>1</audioOutputNums>
<mixAudioInSet>false</mixAudioInSet>
<mixAudioOutSet>false</mixAudioOutSet>
<isSupportAudioMixing>false</isSupportAudioMixing>
</AudioCap>
<isSupportSubscribeEvent>true</isSupportSubscribeEvent>
</SysCap>
<voicetalkNums>1</voicetalkNums>
<isSupportSnapshot>true</isSupportSnapshot>
<isSupportPictureServer>true</isSupportPictureServer>
<supportImageChannel>true</supportImageChannel>
<SecurityCap version="2.0" xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema">
<supportUserNums>1</supportUserNums>
<userBondIpNums>1</userBondIpNums>
<userBondMacNums>1</userBondMacNums>
<isSupCertificate>false</isSupCertificate>
<issupIllegalLoginLock>true</issupIllegalLoginLock>
<isSupportOnlineUser>false</isSupportOnlineUser>
<isSupportAnonymous>false</isSupportAnonymous>
<isSupportStreamEncryption>false</isSupportStreamEncryption>
<securityVersion opt="1,2"/>
<keyIterateNum>100</keyIterateNum>
<isSupportUserCheck>true</isSupportUserCheck>
<salt/>
<isSupportGUIDFileDataExport>true</isSupportGUIDFileDataExport>
<isSupportSecurityQuestionConfig>false</isSupportSecurityQuestionConfig>
<isSupportGetOnlineUserListSC>false</isSupportGetOnlineUserListSC>
<SecurityLimits>
<LoginPasswordLenLimit/>
<SecurityAnswerLenLimit/>
</SecurityLimits>
<RSAKeyLength opt="512,1024,2048"/>
<isSupportONVIFUserManagement>false</isSupportONVIFUserManagement>
<WebCertificateCap>
<CertificateType  opt="basic"/>
</WebCertificateCap>
<isSupportConfigFileImport>true</isSupportConfigFileImport>
<isSupportConfigFileExport>true</isSupportConfigFileExport>
<cfgFileSecretKeyLenLimit min="0" max="32"/>
<isSupportMaintenanceDataExport>true</isSupportMaintenanceDataExport>
<isSupportUserDataImport>false</isSupportUserDataImport>
<isSupportUserDataExport>false</isSupportUserDataExport>
<isSupportDeviceCertificatesManagement>true</isSupportDeviceCertificatesManagement>
<isSupportEncryptCertificate>false</isSupportEncryptCertificate>
<isSupportCertificateCustomID>true</isSupportCertificateCustomID>
</SecurityCap>
<EventCap/>
<VideoIntercomCap/>
<RacmCap>
<SecurityLog>
<isSupportLogServer>true</isSupportLogServer>
</SecurityLog>
</RacmCap>
<isSupportAcsUpdate>true</isSupportAcsUpdate>
<isSupportAccessControlCap>true</isSupportAccessControlCap>
<isSupportAlgorithmsInfo>true</isSupportAlgorithmsInfo>
<isSupportClientProxyWEB>true</isSupportClientProxyWEB>
<WEBLocation opt="local,remote">local</WEBLocation>
<isSupportEZVIZParameterTest>true</isSupportEZVIZParameterTest>
</DeviceCap>
